toast.macrocraft.notInWorld.title: Not in world
toast.macrocraft.notInWorld.description: You must be in a world to record a macro
You must be in a world to play a macro
toast.macrocraft.emptyMacro.description: You cannot play an empty macro
toast.macrocraft.loadedMacro.title: Loaded Macro
toast.macrocraft.finished.title: Macro Finished
toast.macrocraft.finished.description: Executed %s actions in %s seconds from macro "%s"
toast.macrocraft.paused.title: Macro Paused
toast.macrocraft.resumed.title: Macro Resumed
screen.macrocraft.config.title: %s Configuration
screen.macrocraft.config.blockInputsWhen: When enabled, all inputs, except for keybinds, will be blocked while a macro is playing.
screen.macrocraft.config.ignoreMenuNavig: When enabled, the macro will disregard inputs while a menu is opened that pauses the game.
screen.macrocraft.config.ignoreChatTypin: When enabled, the macro will disregard typing inputs while the chat is open.
screen.macrocraft.config.moveMouseWhenPl: When enabled, the macro will move the mouse to the recorded position before executing a mouse action.
screen.macrocraft.config.shouldRenderHud: When enabled, the HUD will be rendered while a macro is playing or recording.
screen.macrocraft.record.title: Record Macro
screen.macrocraft.record.unload.confirm: Are you sure you want to unload the current macro?
This will delete all unsaved changes.
screen.macrocraft.record.errorLoaded: You cannot record a macro while another macro is loaded
screen.macrocraft.play.title: Play Macro
screen.macrocraft.save.title: Save Macro
screen.macrocraft.save.alreadySaved: This macro has already been saved
screen.macrocraft.overwrite.title: A macro with name "%s" already exists
screen.macrocraft.overwrite.description: Do you want to overwrite the macro "%s"?
screen.macrocraft.macroList.title: All Macros
screen.macrocraft.macroList.delete.title: Delete Macro
screen.macrocraft.macroList.delete.descr: Are you sure you want to delete the macro "%s"? This action cannot be undone.
screen.macrocraft.macro.title: Loading Macro...
command.macrocraft.recording.already: You are already recording a macro
command.macrocraft.recording.not: You are not recording a macro
